record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that we have a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak longer than 10 minutes. I don't intend to speak for more than 25 minutes and maybe not that long. I would at least like to have the freedom of going beyond 10 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
